item.title: What makes a map immersive?
item.description: Context # As I’m diving into the investigation of battlemaps and their use-cases, the previous question being as simple as “Why do you use battlemaps?", I was really interested in the fact that because they allow visual immersion was the most popular answer. As a completely unexpected move, I thus started a new poll asking “What makes a map immersive?" (didn’t see that coming, heh?), hoping to get a better grasp on how DMs and players come to feel immersed from digitally painted maps.
